name: The Flight into Egypt
description: The Flight into Egypt; Master of the Llangattock Hours (Flemish, active about 1450 - 1460); Bruges (illuminated), Belgium; 1450s; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 26.4 x 18.4 cm (10 3/8 x 7 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 7, fol. 103v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Flight into Egypt
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment
